oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Pen and ink drawing of Brown home
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pen and ink drawing of antebellum home on Old Salem Road in Murfreesboro, Tennessee. Mr. and Mrs. Jesse Brown owned this home. It was built by Thomas Blanks Turner and was surrounded by a Federal encampment during the Civil War.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
